item.title: This forgotten tech stock is outperforming and appears ready to break out, according to the charts

item.title: These European stocks have the most to lose from Trump's tariffs
item.description: European stocks with high revenue exposure to the U.S. face headwinds from President Trump's tariffs, according to Bank of America.

item.title: Buy this lawn and garden play that can thrive in a tough economy, says Truist
